author: etan_status
content: Have the receipts now as well on https://eth-light.xyz, also based on SSZ `PartialContainer`. The Snappy compression works even better there, likely because of the logs Bloom ðŸ™‚ Specs still wip

author: etan_status
content:
Updated https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493 to use the SSZ `PartialContainer` (https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7495)

This is compatible with the previous version, but further restricts the definitions from generic SSZ containers to ones where common fields are assigned the same SSZ generalized indices, hence having improved merkleization properties (simpler verifiers).

Furthermore, https://eth-light.xyz has a showcase to inspect the proposed SSZ representation for any given transaction.
`"https://eth-light.xyz/tx/" + txHash + "#ssz"`   (use `#receipt/ssz` suffix for receipt / receipt spec not yet updated)
